summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Block 2 Testimonials Management System. All backend APIs (CRUD, options, public, filters) and frontend UI components working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/testimonials returns list with stats (200)
Backend: GET /api/testimonials/options returns all dropdown options (formatos=6, enfoques=8, industries=10, niveles=4, status_options=6)
Backend: POST /api/testimonials creates testimonial with minimal fields
Backend: POST /api/testimonials creates testimonial with all fields (dropdowns, ratings, video links, valor_agregado)
Backend: GET /api/testimonials/{id} returns single testimonial
Backend: PUT /api/testimonials/{id} updates testimonial and persists changes
Backend: DELETE /api/testimonials/{id} removes testimonial (verified with 404 on GET)
Backend: DELETE /api/testimonials/{id} returns 404 for nonexistent
Backend: GET /api/testimonials with formato_id filter works
Backend: GET /api/testimonials with valor_agregado filter works
Backend: GET /api/testimonials/public works without authentication
Backend: GET /api/testimonials/public excludes email for privacy
Backend: All protected endpoints require authentication (401/403 without token)
Frontend: Testimonials page loads at /nurture/testimonials
Frontend: Stats cards display Total, Published, Scheduled counts
Frontend: Add Testimonial button opens dialog
Frontend: Add Testimonial dialog has all required fields (nombre, apellido, correo, testimonio)
Frontend: Add Testimonial dialog has 6 classification dropdowns (Format, Focus, Industry, Program, Level, Status)
Frontend: Add Testimonial dialog has video links (Vimeo, Descript)
Frontend: Add Testimonial dialog has 4 rating selectors (Presentation, Articulation, Video Quality, Results)
Frontend: Add Testimonial dialog has Added Value checkbox
Frontend: Add Testimonial dialog has Publish From Date input
Frontend: Creating testimonial through UI works and shows success toast
Frontend: New testimonial appears in table with correct data
Frontend: Import Excel button opens import dialog
Frontend: Import dialog has file upload area and Expected Column Names accordion
Frontend: Filters toggle button expands filter panel
Frontend: Filter panel has 5 dropdown filters (Format, Focus, Industry, Program, Level)
Frontend: Filter panel has Clear All and Apply Filters buttons
Frontend: Table displays testimonials with badges (Format, Focus, Status)
Frontend: Table displays ratings with star icons
Frontend: Table displays video link icons (Vimeo, Descript)
Frontend: Table displays Added Value badge
Frontend: Edit and Delete action buttons work
Frontend: Search input filters testimonials
seed_data_creation: Test testimonials created and cleaned up during testing. 1 existing testimonial (Carlos Mendoza) in database.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Block 2 Testimonials Management System fully tested. All CRUD operations, dropdown options, filters, and Excel import UI working. Existing data: 1 testimonial from Carlos Mendoza with Format=Masterclass, Focus=Profit, ratings (Pres=5, Artic=4), Added Value badge. Dropdown options available: 6 formatos, 8 enfoques, 10 industries, 0 programas, 4 niveles, 6 status options.

backend_endpoints.POST /api/testimonials: WORKING - Creates testimonial with all fields
